p: In the same direction, we recommend the development of an electronic course on preventive education, which students study at different stages of education, so that this course selects topics that are appropriate to the level of each stage, as well as the conditions and needs of society and the environment in which students live in light of the need of COVID‐19. Also, the inclusion of the items and aspects of preventive education in the curricula by using the bridging strategy, and linking what students study with the situations and problems they face in their daily lives due to the outbreak of the COVID‐19 pandemic as one of the epidemics of the 21st century.
